# Animals Data Frame Creation

This document demonstrates how to create a data frame in R.

```{r}
animal=c("Snake", "Ostrich", "Cat", "Spider")

num_legs=c(0,2,4,8)

animals_df=data.frame(animal,num_legs)
```

```{r}
print(animals_df)
```
